description:
Jacob came in with his best friend, who will be doing a solo next week.
He seems like a typical small town kid- partying with friends, school, and of course chasing girls.
I think he talked his buddy into doing the solo, not just because the two of them have tagged team girls together, but having his friend along would be safer. Despite fucking the same girl, they weren't up for even a side-by-side jerk off.
Jacob has got a hot little body on him and though he is one of those stealth jerkers, he stays really hard, and pre-cum is constantly oozing out of his plump dick head.
He thought the solo was easy, and after they both finished, they thought they could do "more".
But I am not gonna hold my breath. I also got the idea they thought they would be doing straight porn, so we will see if they can be coaxed into some guy-on-guy stuff.
title: Jacob - Solo
